data.name: Hazardous Space - OST + Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
These materials contain the full soundtrack of the Hazardous Space game and additional wallpapers for your PC. Get immersed in the eerie and dangerous atmosphere of the Wanderer space station, and decorate your OS with bright moments from the adventures of Max and his team.

Track List:

1. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Obscuration
2. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Meteor
3. Hazardous Space Idle theme - Semisphere
4. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Goliath
5. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Сosmogony
6. Hazardous Space Idle theme - Parsec
7. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Bolide
8. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Astronaut
9. Hazardous Space Idle theme - Constellation
10. Hazardous Space Fight theme - Quasar

Bonus Tracks:

1. Bonus Edition HS - Dark theme
2. Bonus Edition HS - Dark theme 2
3. Bonus Edition HS - Doom without drums
4. Bonus Edition HS - Doom without lead
5. Bonus Edition HS - Dashboard theme
6. Bonus Edition HS - Ambient theme
7. Bonus Edition HS - Ambient theme 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Speakers or Headphones/Headset to listen to audio files
